__e: If you got to say anything to him, tell him you pity him. Tell him you feel so sorry for him you could cry.
We're waiting for him, it's a pity that he's not here with us, but it's okay.
As for him, I suppose you can pity a man who has to buy a woman... to keep from living with himself.
If you really care about House, you'll stop feeling sorry for him and get out there and start kicking him where he needs kicking.
Well, sir, I'm sure that whoever did this regrets her or his mistake and will do the right thing.
Fuck everyone who feels sorry for you. And those who know nothing.
But she will be so disappointed at not having seen you again.
I know they will be sorry to see you return home so soon.
But there is no point to regretting things that have gone to the trouble of happening.
And I don't want to regret losing the love of my life, and I do want to have his kids.
In any case, he mentioned something about you having regrets about putting men in harm's way.
But that pain, that regret... That's what made you a person...
If someone does find you here, you will be very fucking sorry, hmm?
